title: Celeriac steaks with spicy pepper sauce & Greek cheese

ingredients.item: 1 celeriac, peeled and cut into 4 steaks
2 large red chillies, deseeded and chopped
100g roasted jarred red peppers, rinsed, patted dry and roughly chopped
½ lemon, finely grated zest and juice

instructions.step: Cook the celeriac steaks in boiling, salted water for 10-15 minutes, until tender when tested with the tip of a knife. Preheat the oven to 240°C, gas mark 9. Pat the celeriac steaks dry and put them into
a large roasting tin, drizzle with the oil and roast for 15-20 minutes until golden.
Meanwhile, use a stick blender to whizz together the chillies, peppers, caraway seeds, garlic and lemon juice to make a sauce. Season and set aside.
Divide the lentils between 4 plates, top with a celeriac steak, then spoon over some chilli sauce, crumble over some cheese and add a little
lemon zest. Add some salad leaves to serve.
